report.title: Sections list
report.description: A general purpose list of locations including option to filter by an intersecting point.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations lp ON lp.id=l.parent_id AND lp.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ttype ON ttype.id=l.location_type_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND l.deleted=false AND (l.public=true or lw.website_id in (#website_ids#)) #order_by#

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: intersects
param.description: Geometry to filter to locations intersecting with as WKT, Web Mercator projection
param.where: st_intersects(l.boundary_geom, st_geomfromtext('#intersects#', 900913)) and not st_touches(l.boundary_geom, st_geomfromtext('#intersects#', 900913))

param.name: exclude_composites
param.description: Ignore composition locations (which have a + in their code field), e.g. combined vice counties such as Sussex
param.where: (l.code is null or l.code not like '%+%')
